topic.title: Asante Ashland Community Hospital Lean Lab Initiative

section.title: Overview
section.p: Asante Ashland Community Hospital collaborated with Beckman Coulter to address lab-related inefficiencies, including long patient wait times, delayed order filing, and lost or duplicate orders. These issues affected both patient experience and hospital workflows.

section.title: Solution
section.p: The hospital implemented a HIPAA-compliant digital order management system and integrated Meditech scheduling software to streamline processes. Staff were trained on standardized procedures to ensure smooth adoption.

steps.step: Scan faxed orders into a centralized digital system.
Index orders by patient name and date of birth for easy access.
Integrate Meditech to create patient accounts for each order.
Train staff on policies and procedures using competency checklists.

section.title: Results
section.p: Order wait times decreased from 200 minutes to 80 minutes, and patient registration wait times improved significantly. The hospital achieved a sustainable improvement in operational efficiency and patient care quality.
